gist.headline: Meet Polly, the code wizard
gist.blurb: We've open-sourced Polly, our AI-powered Discord bot. She bridges chat with GitHub, searches code, and even writes autonomous fixes.
gist.summary: Introduced the full source code for Polly, a comprehensive Discord bot featuring GitHub integration, semantic code search, and autonomous AI coding agents.
gist.impact: Community members gain a powerful AI assistant in Discord that can answer technical questions, manage repository tasks, and execute code in a sandbox.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations Bee (organic) meeting Polly (digital/robotic). A synthesis of nature and tech. The Bee is guiding a small, cute pixel-robot through a garden of code syntax.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby Pollinations bee mascot hovering next to a cute, tiny 8-bit robot character holding a pixelated blueprint. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Floating digital sparkles and code symbols. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
